name: Under The Moonlight
description:
"Miguel left home to find a little of himself without family influence. After years on the road and finally becoming comfortable with who he is he makes the decision to settle down with old friends.  In a new town filled with old faces it's time to face the hurt he's caused in his years of absence."

[1.0 Demo made for Yaoi Game Jam 2019]

[If there are any spelling or grammar mistakes you would like to report to me please do! Even though in the demo I said not to bother I would like to give people the chance to point out things that bother them or obvious mistakes. Writing is not my strong suit and English is my 2nd language and not one I speak daily as much as before so I'd be very grateful for the help! Thank you! -Reyes]

If you would like to support Reyes she has a Patreon and a Ko-fi. Follow her on Patreon to be notified when she posts sneak peeks of the games she's working on!

If you would like to play the prototype that this game was made from click here.
